wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Knox (born 22 December 1999) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a striker for Warrenpoint Town in the NIFL Premiership. Knox has previously played for Livingston, East Fife, Berwick Rangers and Brechin City.

response: In January 2017, he was named as one of the Daily Records Scottish footballing prospects for 2017 alongside Tony Gallagher, Matthew Knox, Ronan Hughes,  Liam Burt and Jack Aitchison. Currie suffered a serious knee ligament injury in November 2017. He was subsequently loaned to East Fife, Forfar Athletic and Linfield.
